abstract: Judge Richard M Gergel of Federal District Court in Charleston, SC, schedules November trial for Dylann S Roof, white man accused in massacre of nine African-American worshipers at church in June 2015; suggests up to 1,500 prospective jurors might be called statewide.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors are seeking the death penalty in the trial, which will begin Nov. 7, and up to 1,500 prospective jurors may be called.

headline.main: November Trial Scheduled for Dylann Roof in Charleston Church Killings
headline.print_headline: November Trial for Suspect in Church Shooting

snippet: Federal prosecutors are seeking the death penalty in the trial, which will begin Nov. 7, and up to 1,500 prospective jurors may be called.
